00021 #include "CHPFileUpdater.h"

00026 using namespace std;
00027 using namespace affxchp;
00028 using namespace affxchpwriter;
00029 
00031 
00032 #define EXPRESSION_ABSOLUTE_STAT_ANALYSIS 2
00033 
00035 
00036 /*
00037  * Initialize any needed members.
00038  */
00039 CCHPFileUpdater::CCHPFileUpdater() : CCHPFileWriter()
00040 {
00041         m_CHPFile = NULL;
00042 }
00043 
00044 /*
00045  * Clean up.
00046  */
00047 CCHPFileUpdater::~CCHPFileUpdater()
00048 {
00049         CloseCHPFile();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void CCHPFileUpdater::OpenCHPFile(const char *fileName)
00053 {
00054         CloseCHPFile();
00055         m_CHPFile = new ofstream(fileName, ios::binary | ios::app);
00056         if (!m_CHPFile) { Err::errAbort("CCHPFileUpdater::OpenCHPFile() - Unable to open CHP file for updating: " + ToStr(fileName)); }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void CCHPFileUpdater::UpdateExpressionEntry(int row, unsigned char Detection, float DetectionPValue, float Signal, unsigned short NumPairs, unsigned short NumUsedPairs)
00060 {
00061         // Save the data size for the first probe set.
00062         if (row == 0)
00063         {
00064                 unsigned char analysisType = EXPRESSION_ABSOLUTE_STAT_ANALYSIS;
00065                 int resultsSize = UCHAR_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + USHORT_SIZE + USHORT_SIZE; 
00066                 WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, analysisType);
00067                 WriteInt32_I(*m_CHPFile, resultsSize);
00068         }
00069 
00070         // Write the absolute data.
00071         WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, Detection);
00072         WriteFloat_I(*m_CHPFile, DetectionPValue);
00073         WriteFloat_I(*m_CHPFile, Signal);
00074         WriteUInt16_I(*m_CHPFile, NumPairs);
00075         WriteUInt16_I(*m_CHPFile, NumUsedPairs);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void CCHPFileUpdater::UpdateGenotypeEntry(int row, uint8_t call, float confidence, float RAS1, float RAS2, float aaCall, float abCall, float bbCall, float noCall)
00079 {
00080         // Save the data size for the first probe set.
00081         if (row == 0)
00082         {
00083                 int resultsSize = UCHAR_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE; 
00084                 WriteInt32_I(*m_CHPFile, resultsSize);
00085         }
00086 
00087         // Write probe set result.
00088         WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, call);
00089         WriteFloat_I(*m_CHPFile, confidence);
00090         if (aaCall == 0) { WriteFloat_I(*m_CHPFile, RAS1); }
00091         else { WriteFloat_I(*m_CHPFile, aaCall); }
00092         if (abCall == 0) { WriteFloat_I(*m_CHPFile, RAS2); }
00093         else { WriteFloat_I(*m_CHPFile, abCall); }
00094         WriteFloat_I(*m_CHPFile, bbCall);
00095         WriteFloat_I(*m_CHPFile, noCall);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void CCHPFileUpdater::CloseCHPFile()
00099 {
00100         if (m_CHPFile != NULL)
00101         {
00102                 if (m_CHPFile->is_open() == true) { m_CHPFile->close(); }
00103                 delete m_CHPFile;
00104                 m_CHPFile = NULL;
00105         }
00106 }
